nodes.text: After the Battle of Hoth during the Galactic Civil War, Commander Ellian Zahra was in command of an assault group that was tasked with destroying the Rebel Armada of the Alliance to Restore the Republic and operated in the Mid Rim. Shortly after the Duel on Cloud City, Zahra managed to track down Fourth Division and Eighth Division, attacking them simultaneously.

Eighth Division was destroyed by Zahra's forces in a battle near Malastare, while Fourth Division suffered 10% casualties during the Battle at Rendezvous Point Delta-Three since it managed to escape, thanks to the arrival of the Millennium Falcon. Afterwards, Tarkin's Will destroyed the Sixth Division.

The fleet consisted of at least three Imperial-class Star Destroyers including the flagship Tarkin's Will, as well as fourteen Arquitens-class command cruisers. The fleet was also bolstered by an Interdictor vessel that was used in the destruction of the Eighth Division. In addition, among Ellian Zahra's naval forces were TIE fighters of the TIE/ln and TIE/rb models.
